networks.Line.Line¶

class networks.Line.Line(name, from_bus_id, to_bus_id, length_km, max_loading_percent, r_ohm_per_km, x_ohm_per_km, c_nf_per_km, r0_ohm_per_km, x0_ohm_per_km, c0_nf_per_km, norm_amp, max_amp, num_parallel, derating_factor, phases)¶

Bases: Element

Represents a transmission line in a power system network.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the line.

  • from_bus_id (int) – The ID of the “from” bus of the line.

  • to_bus_id (int) – The ID of the “to” bus of the line.

  • length_km (float) – Length of the line in kilometers.

  • max_loading_percent (float) – Maximum loading percentage of the line.

  • r_ohm_per_km (float) – Resistance of the line per kilometer in ohms.

  • x_ohm_per_km (float) – Reactance of the line per kilometer in ohms.

  • c_nf_per_km (float) – Capacitance of the line per kilometer in nanofarads.

  • r0_ohm_per_km (float) – Zero sequence resistance of the line per kilometer in ohms.

  • x0_ohm_per_km (float) – Zero sequence reactance of the line per kilometer in ohms.

  • c0_nf_per_km (float) – Zero sequence capacitance of the line per kilometer in nanofarads.

  • norm_amp (float) – Nominal ampacity of the line.

  • max_amp (float) – Maximum ampacity of the line.

  • num_parallel (int) – Number of parallel lines.

  • derating_factor (float) – Derating factor of the line.

  • phases (str) – Phases of the line.

__init__(name, from_bus_id, to_bus_id, length_km, max_loading_percent, r_ohm_per_km, x_ohm_per_km, c_nf_per_km, r0_ohm_per_km, x0_ohm_per_km, c0_nf_per_km, norm_amp, max_amp, num_parallel, derating_factor, phases)¶

Initializes a Line object.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the line.

  • from_bus_id (int) – The ID of the “from” bus of the line.

  • to_bus_id (int) – The ID of the “to” bus of the line.

  • length_km (float) – Length of the line in kilometers.

  • max_loading_percent (float) – Maximum loading percentage of the line.

  • r_ohm_per_km (float) – Resistance of the line per kilometer in ohms.

  • x_ohm_per_km (float) – Reactance of the line per kilometer in ohms.

  • c_nf_per_km (float) – Capacitance of the line per kilometer in nanofarads.

  • r0_ohm_per_km (float) – Zero sequence resistance of the line per kilometer in ohms.

  • x0_ohm_per_km (float) – Zero sequence reactance of the line per kilometer in ohms.

  • c0_nf_per_km (float) – Zero sequence capacitance of the line per kilometer in nanofarads.

  • norm_amp (float) – Nominal ampacity of the line.

  • max_amp (float) – Maximum ampacity of the line.

  • num_parallel (int) – Number of parallel lines.

  • derating_factor (float) – Derating factor of the line.

  • phases (str) – Phases of the line.
